# MessagePort

**Class**

A port that can be used as an endpoint for distributed object connections (or raw messaging).

## Declaration

```swift
class MessagePort
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/MessagePort] is a subclass of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Port] that allows for local (on the same machine) communication only. A companion class, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/SocketPort], allows for both local and remote communication, but may be more expensive than [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/MessagePort] for the local case.

[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/MessagePort] defines no additional methods over those already defined by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Port].
